dataset.select: select cg.id, cg.status_id, s.note as status_name, g.name, cg.cost, cg.price, cg.amount, (case when coalesce(cg.amount, 0) = 0 then 0 else coalesce(cg.uses, 0) * 100 / coalesce(cg.amount, 0) end)::integer as percent_uses from calc_item_goods cg left join goods g on (g.id = cg.item_id) join status s on (s.id = cg.status_id) where cg.owner_id = :owner_id
dataset.select-id: select cg.id, cg.status_id, s.note as status_name, g.name, cg.cost, cg.price, cg.amount, (case when coalesce(cg.amount, 0) = 0 then 0 else coalesce(cg.uses, 0) * 100 / coalesce(cg.amount, 0) end)::integer as percent_uses from calc_item_goods cg left join goods g on (g.id = cg.item_id) join status s on (s.id = cg.status_id) where cg.id = :id

dataset.select: select cg.id, c.name as calculation_name, cg.item_id, cg.amount, cg.price, cg.cost from calc_item_goods cg join calculation c on (c.id = cg.owner_id) where cg.id = :id
dataset.update: update calc_item_goods set item_id = :item_id, amount = :amount, price = :price, cost = :cost where id = :id

controls.dataset: with recursive r as (select id, status_id, parent_id, name from goods where parent_id is null and not code in ('Прд', 'Усл') and status_id in (500, 1002) union select g.id, g.status_id, g.parent_id, g.name from goods g join r on r.id = g.parent_id and g.status_id in (500, 1002)) select * from r order by name
